snippet.title: Phrased Out - A Trivia Quest RPG Game - Story Trailer (OFFICIAL)
snippet.description:
Something strange is happening to the creatures of the planet. Battle your way through hundreds of monsters and thousands of trivia questions. Help BeepBoop and The Child decode the mystery, one phrase at a time.

Phrased Out is a new Trivia Quest game for Android and iOS. Answer questions through simple hangman-style gameplay, upgrade your characters, and fight through a gauntlet of enemies to decode the mystery. Trivia topics include video game trivia, anime trivia, movie trivia, sports trivia, history trivia, science trivia, and more!

Download now! https://get.phrasedout.com/cXtu/dde64fa0
